price: 66. Allena waa Kan idin nooleeya, haddana idin dhinsiiya, haddana idin soo nooleyn mar kale (Maalinta Qiyaamaha). Aadmigu waa mid abaal dhac badan.
arabic: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِيٓ أَحۡيَاكُمۡ ثُمَّ يُمِيتُكُمۡ ثُمَّ يُحۡيِيكُمۡۗ إِنَّ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ لَكَفُورٞ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wahuwa alladhī aḥyākum thumma yumītukum thumma yuḥ'yīkum inna al-insāna lakafūrun
translations: He will cause you to die
